snippet.title: EXCEED 2ND VAMPIRE - Normal - 395.264
snippet.description:
EDIT : since this game has become nearly impossible to find, I will provide my link as a way to prevent its disapearance.
https://www.mediafire.com/file/aaei9ddch6io8mu/EXceed2ndVampire.zip/file

Setup: keyboard.
Objective: Normal one credit clear, scoring focused
Final score: 395.264

It's easy to forget that between the terrible Gun Bullet Children and the excellent Vampire REX, there was another EXceed. Realizing there are nearly no videos about it, I decided to make one.

I planned to do it on Hard first, but I quickly changed my mind: this game, just like Gun Bullet Children, is very poorly designed and balanced.

There are totally inhuman patterns, but these are compensated by the fact the laser is insane, and recharge extremely fast. On Hard, the bullet amount is doubled, every enemy drop suicid bullets, and the laser recharge rate is halved... I'm not sure Hard is humanly possible.
